I want them to use Spider-Girl, it's so easy to do, Have Peter be long retired after a double whammy physical and emotional blow, and Have Mayday discover her powers during the events of avengers, 

Have Peter not want her working with them Because he hates the starks because Howard stole the arc reactor designs from Dok Oc leading to the fight that cost him his leg and forced him to kill Octavious to protect Howard, 

Who had taken advantage of the reformed villain driving him right back into super villainy, robbing the world of a true genius, creating a sort of Edison/Tesla dynamic,
